Name: Weissen Sour
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel.
STIR marmalade with bourbon in base of shaker to dissolve marmalade.
Add lemon juice and bitters, SHAKE with ice.
TOP with beer and briefly stir
Review: Wheaty bourbon with wheat beer and marmaladey citrus notes - they all go hand in hand and so work harmoniously in this unusual long drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2010 by Kevin Diedrich at the Burritt Room in San Francisco, California.
